dict.acceptation: 整洁的，干净的；灵巧的；匀整的；未搀水的；

sent.orig: Neat can be used to describe an idea, a concept.
sent.trans: Neat可以用来指一个好的主意，好的概念。

sent.orig: I'm sure the lecture will be really neat.
sent.trans: 什么？Neat?那不是整齐，乾净的意思吗？

sent.orig: Bow's room was as neat, on the other hand, as his comrade's was disorderly.
sent.trans: 鲍的卧室干净整洁，跟他朋友那间屋子的杂乱无章正好相反。

sent.orig: The girl had her long blonde hair tied back in a neat bun.
sent.trans: 那个女孩把她长长的金发换成一个髻。
